Episodes.Title: Willow Canyon Homeowners Annual Party
Episodes.Plot: Failed actor Henry Pollard returns to work at Party Down catering. He meets his fellow employees, led by his old coworker Ron, a clean-living team leader with big dreams.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,drug use and sexual themes
Episodes.Writer: Rob Thomas, Paul Rudd, John Enbom, Dan Etheridge
Episodes.GuestStars: Jackie Debatin, Enrico Colantoni, Rebecca Creskoff, Eden Sher

Episodes.Title: California College Conservative Union Caucus
Episodes.Plot: At a college conservatives event, students aim to give the Party Down team advice on success. As the event goes on, it turns out the students may not be so bright.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,drug use and sexual themes
Episodes.GuestStars: Jason Dohring, Alona Tal, Josh Gad, Ryan Pinkston

Episodes.Title: Pepper McMasters Singles Seminar
Episodes.Plot: The Party Down team caters a senior singles mixer hosted by Pepper McMasters. Constance has an awkward encounter with an old flame and Casey seeks relationship advice.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,drug use and sexual themes
Episodes.GuestStars: Ed Begley Jr., , Marilu Henner, Olivia Alaina May, Traber Burns

Episodes.Title: Investors Dinner
Episodes.Plot: A land tycoon expects flawless service from the Party Down crew, but Ron's dreams of success threaten to ruin everything. Kyle makes a friend whose lifestyle he hopes to emulate.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,drug use and sexual themes
Episodes.GuestStars: Daran Norris, Ryan Devlin, , Richard Fancy

Episodes.Title: Sin Say Shun Awards Afterparty
Episodes.Plot: The Party Down team caters a porn awards afterparty. Kyle tries to teach Roman to "play it cool" with the porn stars. A mysterious businessman makes Ron a surprising business offer.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,drug use and sexual themes
Episodes.GuestStars: Mather Zickel, Ken Jeong, Beth Dover, Michele Nordin, Jeffrey Vincent Parise, Stormy Daniels, Diana Terranova

Episodes.Title: Taylor Stiltskin Sweet Sixteen
Episodes.Plot: Taylor Stiltskin's film producer father is throwing her the perfect sweet 16--only nobody showed up! Henry runs into an old friend. Ron gets business advice from a rap duo.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,drug use and sexual themes
Episodes.GuestStars: J.K. Simmons, Joey Lauren Adams, Breckin Meyer, Kevin Hart, Allison Scagliotti, Maddy Curley, Oliver Adams

Episodes.Title: Brandix Corporate Retreat
Episodes.Plot: When the Party Down team caters the Brandix corporate retreat, Casey strikes up a friendship with the sports star guest speaker, making both Henry and Roman jealous.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Sexual references and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Rick Fox, , Rob Corddry, Jennifer Manley, Kathleen Parker

Episodes.Title: Celebrate Ricky Sargulesh
Episodes.Plot: The Party Down team's actors are recognized at a party and treated as stars. But when Roman and Ron discover the host is a mobster, they suspect his screenplay might be a confession.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Sexual references and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Steven Weber, Vic Polizos, Maria Zyrianova, Oleg Zatsepin

Episodes.Title: James Rolf High School Twentieth Reunion
Episodes.Plot: Ron decides to cater his own reunion, and begins to slip back into his old drunken habits. Henry considers moving home, causing Casey to consider their "casual" relationship.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Sexual references and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Joe Lo Truglio, Molly Parker, Kyle Bornheimer, Hillary Straney

Episodes.Title: Stennheiser-Pong Wedding Reception
Episodes.Plot: In the season finale, the team is excited to cater a lavish gay wedding, but must take a backseat to the chiseled men of the Adonis catering company. While Ron falls apart, Henry is forced to take charge.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Sexual references and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Kristen Bell, George Takei, Ken Jeong, David Marshall Grant, Daniel Yabut
